thread.title: Anthony Martial elbow draws blood, yet he escapes red card in Man Utd v St Etienne tie | Metro News
thread.title_full: Anthony Martial elbow draws blood, yet he escapes red card in Man Utd v St Etienne tie | Metro News

author: Simon Rice For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Anthony Martial elbow draws blood, yet he escapes red card in Man Utd v St Etienne tie | Metro News
text:
Simon Rice for Metro.co.uk Thursday 16 Feb 2017 9:38 pm Martial made contact with Malcuit’s face 
Manchester United fans suggested Anthony Martial could forge a career in UFC after the Frenchman’s wild elbow during Thursday’s Europa League tie with St Etienne. 
The Manchester United striker swung his arm at Kevin Malcuit in an incident early in the second half of their Round of 32 tie at Old Trafford. It left his opponent with a bleeding mouth that needed treatment on the sidelines. Paul Pogba shows brotherly love after Florentin is forced off injured 
It was unclear if Martial’s actions were deliberate or if it was simply clumsiness from the No 11 as he looked to protect the ball. Referee Pavel Kralovec seemed to think it was somewhere in the middle, opting to book Martial rather than send him off. Martial made serious contact It floored Malcuit Malcuit received treatment (Getty) 
Whatever the intentions of the incident, Manchester United fans were impressed with Martial’s technique which appeared to be straight out of the MMA textbooks. Martial with the spinning back elbow! Where's the UFC contract? #MUFC #MMA #UFC pic.twitter.com/GpyQhBHNHa 
— Josh Lawson (@JoshLawson92) February 16, 2017 Martial with the spinning back elbow that McGregor would be proud of #mufc @FullTimeDEVILS 
— John Kearns (@FelixKearns10) February 16, 2017 Martial with that spinning elbow. TKO
